+    def __cuda_array_interface__(self):
+        """Array view description for cuda tensors.

body:
To follow up, this standard message is used across a relatively wide collection of tensor interfaces when guarding against non-gradient-safe calls. I'm happy to do the update across the board if you'd like, but want to double check before I touch a wider chunk of the interface.

Ex: [numpy](https://github.com/asford/pytorch/blob/36019decacf872dfa48d99d990cf1a0cb9b257ef/tools/autograd/templates/python_variable_methods.cpp#L327-L328), [map_](
https://github.com/asford/pytorch/blob/36019decacf872dfa48d99d990cf1a0cb9b257ef/tools/autograd/templates/python_variable_methods.cpp#L400-L401), [map2_](https://github.com/asford/pytorch/blob/36019decacf872dfa48d99d990cf1a0cb9b257ef/tools/autograd/templates/python_variable_methods.cpp#L418-L419) et al...
